Changelog
=========

0.2 (2009-11-28)
----------------

- Added conditional import of BrowserView for compatibility with Zope 2.9.
  [davisagli]

- Added ability to report request path from the Zope 3 publisher.
  [Tiberiu Ichim, malthe]

0.1 (2008-02-14)
----------------

- Initial release.
  [malthe]
